TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogicalMethodInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 XML Web services 方法的特性和元数据。

span.span: Represents the attributes and metadata for an XML Web service method.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由 SOAP 扩展使用，用来询问将 SOAP 扩展配置为运行的 XML Web service 方法的详细信息。 is used primarily by a SOAP extension to interrogate the details of the XML Web service method with which the SOAP extension is configured to run. 根据 SOAP 扩展的配置方式，它可以在采用的方法中查找有关 XML Web service 方法的详细信息 。Depending on how the SOAP extension is configured, it can find out details about the XML Web service method in the method of that takes a . 通过 使用属性访问应用于 XML Web service 方法的属性和任何自定义属性，提供 XML Web service 方法的参数等详细信息 。The provides details such as the XML Web service method's parameters by accessing the property and any custom attributes applied to the XML Web service method using the property. 有关 SOAP 扩展的更多详细信息，请参阅 [使用 SOAP 扩展修改类或 soap 消息](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/esw638yk(v=vs.100))。For more details on SOAP extensions see the class or [SOAP Message Modification Using SOAP Extensions](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/esw638yk(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AsyncCallbackParameter As ParameterInfo
public: property System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ AsyncCallbackParameter { System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取异步调用中 Begin 方法的 参数的参数信息。

span.span: Gets the parameter information for the parameter of a Begin method in an asynchronous invocation.

value.span: ，它表示 异步方法调用的 参数。

span.span: A representing the parameter of a asynchronous method invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的异步设计模式涉及到调用 `Begin` 方法以启动异步方法调用，并使用 `End` 方法来完成调用。The asynchronous design pattern in the common language runtime involves calling a `Begin` method to start the asynchronous method invocation and an `End` method to complete the invocation. `Begin`除了方法的同步版本所定义的参数外，方法还需要另外两个参数：一个用于存储委托，另一个用于存储需要传递给委托的任何状态信息。The `Begin` method takes two additional parameters besides the parameters defined by the synchronous version of the method: one to store a delegate and one to store any state information that needs to be passed on to the delegate. 此属性表示参数名为的委托的参数 `AsyncCallback` 。This property represents the parameter for the delegate with a parameter name of `AsyncCallback`. 有关异步调用 XML Web services 的详细信息，请参阅[异步与 Xml web services 进行通信](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/tz4bkcx2(v=vs.100))。For more information on invoking XML Web services asynchronously, see [Communicating with XML Web Services Asynchronously](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/tz4bkcx2(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

related.span: 与 XML Web services 进行异步通信

span.span: Communicating with XML Web Services Asynchronously

summary.span: 获取 异步方法调用的返回值。

span.span: Gets the return value of a asynchronous method invocation.

value.span: ，它表示从 异步方法调用返回的 。

span.span: A representing the returned from a asynchronous method invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的异步设计模式涉及到调用 `Begin` 方法以启动异步方法调用，并使用 `End` 方法来完成调用。The asynchronous design pattern in the common language runtime involves calling a `Begin` method to start the asynchronous method invocation and an `End` method to complete the invocation. `Begin`方法通常立即返回一个实现接口的对象 ，该对象随后可传递给 `End` 方法以完成异步方法调用。The `Begin` method typically returns immediately with an object implementing the interface, which can then be passed to the `End` method at a later time to complete the asynchronous method invocation. 实现接口的返回对象由此 属性表示。The returned object implementing the interface is represented by this property. 有关异步调用 XML Web services 的详细信息，请参阅[异步与 Xml web services 进行通信](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/tz4bkcx2(v=vs.100))。For more information on invoking XML Web services asynchronously, see [Communicating with XML Web Services Asynchronously](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/tz4bkcx2(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

related.span: 与 XML Web services 进行异步通信

span.span: Communicating with XML Web Services Asynchronously

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的异步设计模式涉及到调用 `Begin` 方法以启动异步方法调用，并使用 `End` 方法来完成调用。The asynchronous design pattern in the common language runtime involves calling a `Begin` method to start the asynchronous method invocation and an `End` method to complete the invocation. `Begin`除了方法的同步版本所定义的参数外，方法还需要另外两个参数：一个用于存储委托，另一个用于存储需要传递给委托的任何状态信息。The `Begin` method takes two additional parameters besides the parameters defined by the synchronous version of the method: one to store a delegate and one to store any state information that needs to be passed on to the delegate. 此属性表示需要传递到委托中的状态信息。This property represents the state information that needs to be passed into the delegate. 有关异步调用 XML Web services 的详细信息，请参阅[异步与 Xml web services 进行通信](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/tz4bkcx2(v=vs.100))。For more information on invoking XML Web services asynchronously, see [Communicating with XML Web Services Asynchronously](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/tz4bkcx2(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索对 声明此成员的类型的的引用。The property retrieves a reference to a for the type that declares this member. 类（或接口）的成员可以从基类（或接口）声明或继承。A member of a class (or interface) is either declared or inherited from a base class (or interface). 返回的 可能与 实现 XML Web service 的类的不同（如果该类派生自基类，此类所表示的方法在该基类中声明，则 返回的是基类）。The returned might not be the same as the of the class implementing the XML Web service (if that class derives from a base class and the method represented by this class is declared in that base class then the returned is the base class). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor/CS/logicalmethodinfo_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor/VB/logicalmethodinfo_constructor.vb#1)]
